parameters.content:
## 🎯 LinkedIn Lead Scraping Automation Workflow

This workflow automatically scrapes LinkedIn profiles based on natural language queries and saves results to Google Sheets.

### 📋 Process Flow:
1. **💬 Input Processing** → Receive natural language search request via chat
2. **🧠 AI Analysis** → Parse query using GPT-4 to extract roles, location, filters
3. **🔍 Search Building** → Construct optimized LinkedIn search query
4. **🌐 Data Scraping** → Execute search via SerpAPI to find LinkedIn profiles  
5. **📊 Data Processing** → Extract and format lead information (name, role, company, email)
6. **📈 Storage** → Save all leads to Google Sheets for easy access

### ✨ Key Features:
- Natural language input (e.g., "Find 25 AI engineers in Mumbai")
- Automatic email extraction from profile snippets
- Smart query optimization for better results
- Structured data output with timestamps

## 💬 Natural Language Input Processing

### What You Can Ask:
- "Find 50 React developers in San Francisco"
- "Search for AI automation specialists in Mumbai" 
- "Get me 25 startup founders with email addresses"
- "Find senior data scientists at YC companies"

### AI Parser Features:
- Extracts roles, location, lead count, filters
- Handles multiple variations and synonyms
- Supports complex queries with multiple criteria
- Validates output with structured JSON schema

## 🔍 Smart Search & Data Extraction

### Search Optimization:
- Builds targeted LinkedIn site searches
- Combines role keywords with location filters
- Optimizes query structure for better results
- Handles multiple locations (e.g., "SF or NYC")

### Data Extraction:
- Scrapes name, role, company, connections
- Extracts email addresses from snippets
- Captures LinkedIn profile URLs
- Adds timestamp for tracking

## 📈 Data Storage & Management

### Google Sheets Output:
- **Name** - Full name extracted from profile
- **Role** - Job title and position  
- **Company** - Current employer
- **Connections** - Follower/connection count
- **LinkedIn URL** - Direct profile link
- **Email** - Extracted email address (if available)
- **Snippet** - Profile description preview
- **Scraped At** - Timestamp of data collection

### 💡 Pro Tips:
- Data is automatically organized and timestamped
- Email extraction helps with outreach campaigns
- Results can be filtered and sorted in sheets

## 👨‍💻 Creator Information

**Created by:** Lakshit Ukani  
🔗 **LinkedIn:** [Connect with me](https://www.linkedin.com/in/lakshit-ukani/)
🔗 **Youtube:** [Subscribe to my Channel](https://www.youtube.com/@lakshit-ukani?sub_confirmation=1)

### 🤝 Community & Support
💬 **Join Community:** [Skool Community Link](https://www.skool.com/ai-automation-club-7843)   
📚 **Documentation:** [LinkedIn Lead Gen Guide](https://developers.linkedin.com/docs)  

### 📞 Need Help?
- **Quick Questions:** Comment on the YouTube video
- **Workflow Issues:** Post in our community  
- **Business Inquiries:** Connect via LinkedIn

parameters.text:
=You are an instruction parser for an AI lead scraping system. Parse the user request and extract structured information.
User message is -{{ $json['Description of the lead'] }}
Rules:
1. Platform Detection
Look for platform mention in user query. If no platform is mentioned, default to "LinkedIn".
2. Role Extraction
Extract job titles, skills, or professional categories. Include variations and synonyms:

"AI engineer" OR "ML engineer" OR "Machine Learning engineer"
"founder" OR "CEO" OR "co-founder"
"developer" OR "software engineer" OR "programmer"
"data scientist" OR "data analyst" OR "ML researcher"

3. Lead Count
Extract numbers mentioned in phrases like:

"20 leads", "find 50", "at least 30", "I want 25"
If not specified, default to 10

4. Filters
Extract constraints and qualifiers including:
Company Type:

"startup", "enterprise", "funded company", "series A", "series B", "YC company", "unicorn"
"small company", "large corporation", "Fortune 500"

Experience Level:

"senior", "junior", "mid-level", "entry-level"
"5+ years", "10+ years experience", "recent graduate"
"lead", "principal", "staff", "director level"

Contact Information:

"email available", "LinkedIn profile", "phone number", "contact details"

Industry Specific:

"fintech", "healthcare", "SaaS", "e-commerce", "edtech", "blockchain"
"AI/ML", "cybersecurity", "biotech", "cleantech"

Company Size:

"team of 10-50", "500+ employees", "small team", "large organization"

Funding Status:

"recently funded", "profitable", "bootstrap", "venture backed"
"raised funding", "IPO", "acquired"

5. Location
Extract geographic information:

Cities: "San Francisco", "New York", "Mumbai", "London"
States/Regions: "California", "Texas", "Maharashtra"
Countries: "United States", "India", "United Kingdom"
Remote preferences: "remote", "remote-first", "distributed team"
Multiple locations: "SF or NYC", "US or Canada"

6. Keywords
Extract relevant search terms and synonyms that would be useful for search optimization:

Technical skills, tools, programming languages
Industry buzzwords and terminology
Company descriptors and qualifiers

Output Format:
Respond ONLY with valid JSON following the specified schema. No explanations, comments, or additional text.
Example Input Processing:
Input: "search for profile which have AI automation and are located in Mumbai"
Expected Output:
json{
  "platform": "LinkedIn",
  "roles": ["AI automation specialist", "AI automation engineer"],
  "lead_count": 10,
  "filters": ["AI automation experience", "automation tools"],
  "location": "Mumbai",
  "keywords": ["AI", "automation", "machine learning", "artificial intelligence"]
}
Input: "Find 25 senior software engineers at YC startups in San Francisco with email addresses"
Expected Output:
json{
  "platform": "LinkedIn",
  "roles": ["senior software engineer", "software engineer"],
  "lead_count": 25,
  "filters": ["YC company", "startup", "senior level", "email available"],
  "location": "San Francisco",
  "keywords": ["software engineer", "Y Combinator", "startup", "senior"]
}

"example_outputs": {
    "example_1": {
      "input": "search for profile which have AI automation and are located in Mumbai",
      "output": {
        "platform": "LinkedIn",
        "roles": ["AI automation specialist", "AI automation engineer"],
        "lead_count": 10,
        "filters": ["AI automation experience", "automation tools"],
        "location": "Mumbai",
        "keywords": ["AI", "automation", "machine learning", "artificial intelligence"]
      }
    },
    "example_2": {
      "input": "Find 25 senior software engineers at YC startups in San Francisco with email addresses",
      "output": {
        "platform": "LinkedIn",
        "roles": ["senior software engineer", "software engineer"],
        "lead_count": 25,
        "filters": ["YC company", "startup", "senior level", "email available"],
        "location": "San Francisco",
        "keywords": ["software engineer", "Y Combinator", "startup", "senior"]
      }
    },
    "example_3": {
      "input": "Scrape LinkedIn for AI/ML interns or internship opportunities at startups that have recently received funding. I want at least 20 valid leads",
      "output": {
        "platform": "LinkedIn",
        "roles": ["AI intern", "ML intern", "machine learning intern", "artificial intelligence intern"],
        "lead_count": 20,
        "filters": ["startup", "recently funded", "internship", "series A", "series B", "venture capital"],
        "location": "",
        "keywords": ["AI", "ML", "machine learning", "artificial intelligence", "intern", "startup", "funding"]
      }
    },
    "example_4": {
      "input": "Get me 50 CTOs from fintech companies in New York or remote",
      "output": {
        "platform": "LinkedIn",
        "roles": ["CTO", "Chief Technology Officer", "VP Engineering"],
        "lead_count": 50,
        "filters": ["fintech", "financial technology", "C-level", "executive"],
        "location": "New York OR remote",
        "keywords": ["CTO", "fintech", "financial technology", "chief technology officer"]
      }
    },
    "example_5": {
      "input": "Find founders on Linkedin who raised Series A in the last 6 months",
      "output": {
        "platform": "Linkedin",
        "roles": ["founder", "CEO", "co-founder"],
        "lead_count": 10,
        "filters": ["series A", "recently funded", "last 6 months", "raised funding"],
        "location": "",
        "keywords": ["founder", "CEO", "series A", "funding", "startup"]
      }
    },
    "example_6": {
      "input": "Search Linkedin for React developers with 5+ years experience who work at unicorn companies",
      "output": {
        "platform": "Linkedin",
        "roles": ["React developer", "Frontend developer", "Full-stack developer"],
        "lead_count": 10,
        "filters": ["5+ years experience", "unicorn company", "senior level", "billion dollar valuation"],
        "location": "",
        "keywords": ["React", "JavaScript", "frontend", "unicorn", "developer"]
      }
    }
User request: 
{{ $json['Description of the lead'] }}
